parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Loadouts

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns ammo count on given pylon.
Returns false ([[Boolean]]) on failure.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''ammoOnPylon''' pylon

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pylon: [[String]] or [[Number]] - The name or the index of the pylon

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] or [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ammoCount = ([[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[ammoOnPylon]] "pylon1";</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] (([[vehicle]] [[player]]) '''ammoOnPylon''' "pylonCenter");</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Vehicle Loadouts]],[[setAmmoOnPylon]],[[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]],[[getPylonMagazines]],[[animatePylon]],[[animateBay]],[[setPylonsPriority]],[[setPylonLoadout]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 18, 2017 - 14:21 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Commy2|Commy2]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
The pylon indices start at 1 and not at 0.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
